com.phunware.advertising

Class PwBannerAdView

  • Object
    • ViewGroup
      • com.phunware.advertising.PwBannerAdView

  • public final class PwBannerAdView
extends ViewGroup
    Banners are ads that are shown within the layout of your app.

    XML only implementation example:

     <com.phunware.advertising.PwBannerAdView
      android:id="@+id/bannerAd"
      android:layout_width="wrap_content"
      android:layout_height="wrap_content"
      app:zone="YOUR_ZONE_ID"
      app:auto_load="true" />

    Simple code implementation example:

         PwBannerAdView bannerView = PwBannerAdView.getInstance(context);

     // add bannerView to activity layout...

     bannerView.startRequestingAdsForZone("YOUR_ZONE_ID");
    Instances of PwBannerAdView are not safe for use by multiple threads.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  PwBannerAdView.BannerAdListener
      Implement this interface to be notified of banner ad lifecycle changes.

      • setAdUpdateInterval

        public void setAdUpdateInterval(int delaySeconds)
        Sets the interval at which a new ad is requested from the server.
        Parameters:
        delaySeconds - number of seconds to wait between ad requests. Set to 0 to disable auto update.
